ModMetaData.name: Awful Meals
ModMetaData.author: Mlie
ModMetaData.description:
Adds awful versions of all base meals.
General • Add insect-versions of these recipes/meals: Pemmican, Kibble, Simple Meal, Fine Meal, Lavish Meal, Packaged Survival Meal • Has added texture on the original textures to indicate awful-version. • Stats and nutritions are the same as the original meals.
Compatibilities • Compatible with existent saves and other mods.
